hookup.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a connection to a computer or telephone system, to the Internet etc
hookup.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I work from home via a computer hookup.
an office complete with fax, cellular phones and satellite hookup
hookup.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an agreement between two organizations to work together for a particular purpose
hookup.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: a McDonnell Douglas hookup with Taiwan Aerospace Corp. to build the MD-12 jet
